import React,{useState}from"react";import people from'./data';import{FaChevronLeft,FaChevronRight,FaQuoteRight}from"react-icons/fa";import'../Styles/review.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Review=()=>{const[index,setIndex]=useState(0);const{id,name,image,text}=people[index];const checkNumber=number=>{if(number>people.length-1){return 0;}if(number<0){return people.length-1;}return number;};const nextPerson=()=>{setIndex(index=>{let newIndex=index+1;return checkNumber(newIndex);});};const prevPerson=()=>{setIndex(index=>{let newIndex=index-1;return checkNumber(newIndex);});};const minIndex=0;const maxIndex=people.length-1;const getRandomPerson=()=>{const getRandomIntInclusive=(min,max)=>{min=Math.ceil(min);max=Math.floor(max);return Math.floor(Math.random()*(max-min+1)+min);//The maximum is inclusive and the minimum is inclusive
};let randomIndex=getRandomIntInclusive(minIndex,maxIndex);if(randomIndex===index){randomIndex=index+1;}setIndex(checkNumber(randomIndex));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"review",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"img-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:name,className:"person-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"quote-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaQuoteRight,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"author",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"info",children:text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"prev-btn",onClick:prevPerson,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaChevronLeft,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"next-btn",onClick:nextPerson,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaChevronRight,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"random-btn",onClick:getRandomPerson,children:"Get Random Review"})]});};export default Review;
